description: Delete a maintenance requirement part link.
permissions: Allowed when the user can destroy the related maintenance requirement part per MaintenanceRequirementPartPolicy (same rules as create/update: admin; managers can destroy parts; technicians can destroy non-template parts for assigned requirements; operations members can destroy non-template parts with equipment in accessible business units; operations-with-manager-business-unit cannot destroy template parts; general business unit members cannot destroy parts).
side_effects: Deletes the maintenance requirement part link record; if the linked part is non-template and no other links remain, the maintenance requirement part record is deleted.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. --confirm must be set to true.
